description: The island killing of Phillip Mbuji Johansen stirred accusations of racism, denied by authorities.
title: Denmark murder: Brothers jailed over Bornholm island case
title_page: Denmark murder: Brothers jailed over Bornholm island case - BBC News
maintext: The elder brother, 26-year-old Mads Moeller, had swastikas tattooed on his leg, but a witness denied in court that he was racist. The prosecutor said that while it could not be 100% denied that the motive was racist, she said they were unable to "prove it in a court of law".
